column4: Hello guys. I once installed SUSE but it didn't really worked well as I wasn't able to find any drivers for my ATI Mobility Radeon X2300. Now I'd like to install Ubuntu but only if I'd get my graphic card running. Are there any drivers for my card under Ubuntu? :/
it doesn't look good under karmic either http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=497679
